description: Responsive page header for minimally branded sites, eg B2B tools, documentation sites, and internal tools.

demos.name: title-section
demos.title: Header with title section
demos.description: If your site has no navigation you can use this top bar on its own.

demos.name: primary-navigation
demos.title: Header with primary navigation
demos.description: Navigation for an overview of a product's pages. These nav items collapse into a drawer at narrow screen widths.

demos.name: drop-down-navigation
demos.title: Header with primary navigation and drop down menus
demos.description: Navigation for an overview of a product's pages. These nav items collapse into a drawer at narrow screen widths, and can be presented as dropdown menus

demos.name: secondary-navigation
demos.title: Header with a primary and a secondary navigation
demos.description: For sites with more than a few sections, a secondary navigation is also available
